description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent claimed Sunday that “more than 50 countries” have approached the Trump administration to bring down “non-tariff trade barriers,” reduce tariffs, and halt “currency manipulation” on their side. “More than 50 countries have approached … the administration about lowering their non-tariff trade barriers, lowering their tariffs, stopping currency manipulation,” Bessent said on…
title: Bessent: ‘More than 50 countries’ approached administration to lower tariffs, trade barriers and halt ‘currency manipulation’

description: Sen. Cory Booker (D-N.J.) slammed the Trump administration, saying he has never seen an administration “do something so monumentally wrong and that so staggeringly hurts American people.” During an appearance on ABC’s “This Week,” Booker, who last week gave a record-breaking 25-hour speech aimed at combating Trump’s moves in the White House, was asked about…
title: Booker slams Trump after speech: Never seen an administration ‘do something so monumentally wrong’

description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz (D) said on Sunday that President Trump is “not wrong” in identifying the gutting of the manufacturing industry as an issue, but said the president is wrong about tariffs as the solution. “Here’s the thing that the Democrats have to figure out. Donald Trump’s language around this, he’s not wrong that…
title: Walz says Trump ‘not wrong’ that manufacturing has been ‘gutted’ but tariffs ‘not the solution’

description: Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins suggested on Sunday that the European Union is using “fake science” to back up concerns over hormone use in the United States livestock to justify its restrictions on U.S. pork imports. Rollins, in an interview on CNN’s “State of the Union,” defended President Trump’s reciprocal tariffs announced this past week, slamming…
title: Rollins rejects EU concerns over US hormones in pork: ‘Absolute bull’
